trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Export-Counter
trans-unit.target: 导出计数器

trans-unit.source: Export-Counter
trans-unit.target: 导出计数器

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: The Export-Counter cmdlet takes PerformanceCounterSampleSet objects and exports them as counter log files.
trans-unit.target: Export-Counter cmdlet 采用 PerformanceCounterSampleSet 对象并将它们导出为计数器日志文件。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Export-Counter cmdlet exports performance counter data (PerformanceCounterSampleSet objects) to log files in binary performance log (.blg), comma-separated value (.csv), or tab-separated value (.tsv) format.
trans-unit.target: Export-Counter cmdlet 将性能计数器数据（PerformanceCounterSampleSet 对象）以二进制性能日志 (.blg)、逗号分隔值 (.csv) 或制表符分隔值 (.tsv) 格式发送到日志文件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this cmdlet to log or relog performance counter data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此 cmdlet 来记录或重新记录性能计数器数据。

trans-unit.source: Export-Counter is designed to export data that is returned by the Get-Counter and Import-Counter cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Export-Counter 专门用于导出由 Get-Counter 和 Import-Counter cmdlet 返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: Export-Counter runs only on Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, and later versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 仅在 Windows 7、 Windows Server 2008 R2 和更高版本的 Windows 上运行 Export-counter。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command exports counter data to a .blg file.
trans-unit.target: 此命名可将计数器数据导出到 .blg 文件。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-Counter cmdlet to collect processor time data.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-counter cmdlet 收集处理器时间数据。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the data to the **Export-Counter** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它使用管道运算符 (|) 将数据发送到 **Export-counter** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The **Export-Counter** command uses the **Path** variable to specify the output file.
trans-unit.target: **Export-counter** 命令使用 **路径** 变量以指定输出文件。

trans-unit.source: Because the data set might be very large, this command sends the data to **Export-Counter** through the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 因为数据集可能非常大，此命令将数据发送到 **Export-counter** 通过管道。

trans-unit.source: If the data were saved in a variable, the command might use a disproportionate amount of memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据保存在变量中，则该命令可能使用与之大小不相称的内存量。

trans-unit.source: These commands convert a CSV file to a counter data BLG format.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令可将 CSV 文件转换为计数器数据 BLG 格式。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get performance counter data from a remote computer and save the data in a file on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何从远程计算机获取性能计数器数据，并将数据保存在远程计算机上的文件中。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the Import-Counter and **Export-Counter** cmdlets to re-log existing data.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用导入计数器和 **Export-counter** cmdlet 重新记录现有数据。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Circular
trans-unit.target: -循环

trans-unit.source: Indicates that output file should be a circular log with first in, first out (FIFO) format.
trans-unit.target: 指示输出文件应该是采用先进先出 (FIFO) 格式的循环日志。

trans-unit.source: When you include this parameter, the **MaxSize** parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 当包含此参数， **MaxSize** 参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: -FileFormat
trans-unit.target: -FileFormat

trans-unit.source: Specifies the output format of the output log file.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出日志文件的输出格式。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are CSV, TSV, and BLG.
trans-unit.target: 有效值包括 CSV、TSV 和 BLG。

trans-unit.source: The default value is BLG.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 BLG。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Overwrites and replaces an existing file if one exists in the location specified by the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Path 参数指定的位置中存在某个文件，则覆盖并替换该现有文件。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the counter data to export.
trans-unit.target: 指定要导出的计数器数据。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the data or a command that gets the data, such as a Get-Counter or Import-Counter command.
trans-unit.target: 输入包含数据的变量或获取数据的命令（例如，Get-Counter 或 Import-Counter 命令）。

trans-unit.source: -MaxSize
trans-unit.target: -MaxSize

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum size of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: If the Circular parameter is specified, then when the log file reaches the specified maximum size, the oldest entries are deleted as newer ones are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 Circular 参数，则当日志文件达到指定的最大大小时，将删除最早的条目，同时添加较新的条目。

trans-unit.source: If the Circular parameter is not specified, then when the log file reaches the specified maximum size, no new data is added and the cmdlet generates a non-terminating error.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 Circular 参数，则当日志文件达到指定的最大大小时，将不会添加新数据，并且 cmdlet 将生成一个非终止错误。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path and file name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: Enter a relative or absolute path on the local computer, or a Uniform Naming Convention (UNC) path to a remote computer, such as \\\\Computer\Share\file.blg.
trans-unit.target: 输入相对或绝对路径上的本地计算机或通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径到远程计算机，例如 \\\\Computer\Share\file.blg。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Note: The file format is determined by the value of the FileFormat parameter, not by the file name extension in the path.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 确定文件格式由 FileFormat 参数的值，而不是在路径中的文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.PerformanceCounterSampleSet
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.PerformanceCounterSampleSet

trans-unit.source: You can pipe performance counter data from Get-Counter or Import-Counter to Export-Counter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过管道将性能计数器数据从 Get-Counter 或 Import-Counter 导出到 Export-Counter。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The log file generator expects that all input objects have the same counter path and that the objects are arranged in ascending time order.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件生成器要求所有输入对象都具有相同的计数器路径，并且以时间升序顺序排列这些对象。

trans-unit.source: The counter type and path of the first input object determines the properties recorded in the log file.
trans-unit.target: 计数器类型和第一个输入对象的路径确定日志文件中记录的属性。

trans-unit.source: If other input objects do not have a value for a recorded property, the property field is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他输入对象没有已记录属性的值，则属性字段为空。

trans-unit.source: If the objects have property values that were not recorded, the extra property values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象具有未记录的属性值，则忽略额外的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Performance Monitor might not be able to read all logs that Export-Counter generates.
trans-unit.target: 性能监视器可能不能读取 Export-Counter 生成的所有日志。

trans-unit.source: For example, Performance Monitor requires that all objects have the same path and that all objects are separated by the same time interval.
trans-unit.target: 例如，性能监视器要求所有对象都具有相同的路径，并以相同的时间间隔分隔所有对象。

trans-unit.source: The Import-Counter cmdlet does not have a ComputerName parameter.
trans-unit.target: Import-Counter cmdlet 不具有 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: However, if the computer is configured for Windows PowerShell remoting, you can use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run an Import-Counter command on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果计算机针对 Windows PowerShell 远程处理进行了配置，则你可以使用 Invoke-Command cmdlet 在远程计算机上运行 Import-Counter 命令。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.source: Get-Counter
trans-unit.target: 获取计数器

trans-unit.source: Import-Counter
trans-unit.target: 导入计数器
